text:
Recently opened new fishball noodle and laksa place. Their chilli is amazing! Fishball is springy and fresh. Boss mentioned that all his noodles and ingredients are made fresh the day before.

You can see many people having a hearty bowl of laksa. They close around 1-2pm when they are sold out so come early! Food is amazing and affordable. Would definitely support here more often.

Located at Keat Hong Shopping Centre B1-17, Meng Huat Coffee Shop
Love their laksa! The chilli damn shiok. Always looking forward to my next bowl of laksa with them
Laksa was super nice, the broth was rich and flavorful and the many cockles provided were fresh! Absolutely loved it!
Everything is sooo good! The laksa soup, noodle, ingredients. Love it!
Love their laksa, noodles are springy!
